title: purposes of the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2024 (Vesting Day) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gas (amendment) miscellaneous provision act 2024 (vesting day) order 2024

title: purposes of the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 2. The 14th day of May 2024 is appointed to be the vesting day for the
text_raw:
2. The 14th day of May 2024 is appointed to be the vesting day for the 
purposes of the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 
11 of 2024). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 May, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [218] 3
